hero.title: Der kundeforståelse møter teknisk fortreffelighet
hero.subtitle: Lighthouse Growth er et produktutviklingsbyrå basert i Polen, med eget ingeniørteam og et sterkt nettverk i bransjen.

aboutUs.title: Who we are
descriptions: We offer both product development and staff augmentation as a flexible option to use our consultants to extend your core team and speed up your projects.
We provide an access to the large pool of IT Engineers based in Poland, where industry giants like Intel, Box, Microsoft, Google and NVIDIA locate their R&D centers
Option to set up a complete team or engineering branch of your company, including permanent recruitment support with 3 month guarantee.
